snippet.title: Salt and Sanctuary Xbox One Announcement Trailer
snippet.description: At long last, Salt and Sanctuary, Ska Studios’ brutal hand-drawn 2D Soulslike platformer prepares to strike Xbox One on February 6, with the help of porting specialist BlitWorks.

localized.title: Salt and Sanctuary Xbox One Announcement Trailer
localized.description: At long last, Salt and Sanctuary, Ska Studios’ brutal hand-drawn 2D Soulslike platformer prepares to strike Xbox One on February 6, with the help of porting specialist BlitWorks.
